mapper.sql: a.moid as "moid", a.cCode as "cCode", a.cVenCode as "cVenCode", a.cVenName as "cVenName", a.dDate as "dDate", a.dCreateTime as "dCreateTime", a.cMemo as "cMemo", a.cInvCode as "cInvCode", a.cInvName as "cInvName", a.cInvStd as "cInvStd", a.cComUnitCode as "cComUnitCode", a.cComUnitName as "cComUnitName", a.iQuantity as "iQuantity", a.dStartDate as "dStartDate", a.dArriveDate as "dArriveDate", a.cbMemo as "cbMemo", a.moDetailsID as "moDetailsID", a.iVouchRowNo as "iVouchRowNo"
